name: FireBall (RamenPhysics22)
description:
A very simple mobile game-like game. Dodge rain drops falling to get points. In a prototype stage so there will be more features added such as background skins, player skins, new obstacles, and soundtracks. Let me know on what you liked, didn't like, what you want to add, etc: 

Feedback

This is my first finished project so support me if you want to be most importantly, let me know on how to improve certain things

Project was heavily inspired by: This fellow creator so credits to him for the ideas and almost everything
